mapper.update: update branch set name = #{name}, address = #{address}, ownerId = #{ownerId} where code = #{code}
mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rn, tt.* from (select * from branch order by code asc) tt) where rn >= #{startNum} and rn <= #{endNum}
